All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
CleanText
Takes a text file that we got visiting the links and processes it for indexing
Crawler
Class to crawl the webpages based on seed URL until a stopping limit.
FileUtils
utilities for working with files
InvertedIndex
class to reverse index the files for search
RankingWebpages
Class ranking webpages nested hashmap - frequency hashmap<wordIndex, hashmap<sourceIndex, frequency>> Public methods: sortAll() sortByWord(String) sortByMultiWords(String[])
StringUtils
utilities for working with text
Suggestions
suggests user correct spelling
ToText
Converts the saved links to text files
UI
This class runs the program.
